name: EPOC
description:
Controls:

E to open the shop

Right-Click to place a building

Skip-Button to skip the rest of the building phase

Gameplay:

Day (Building Phase)

During the day you can but and place buildings to produce resources and defend your town. Each building has a cost so make sure you manage your resources!

Night (Defense Phase)

Each night monsters come out of the brush and try to attack your town hall. If they reach it your town will fall so defend it well!

Buildings:

Farm: Produces Food, the warmer the more produced. Costs 3 Wood

Mines: Produces Gold. Costs 2 Wood 1 Food

Forest: Produces Wood. Costs 1 Gold 2 Food

Crossbow: Slow fire rate, High damage. Costs 2 Wood 1 Gold

Elemental Flower: Fast fire rate, Low damage. Costs 1 Food 1 Wood 1 Gold
